description:
net/http: bit more docs on Client vs Transport

This isn't as bad as it used to be, but add a bit
more detail to close the issue.

Fixes issue 3359

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

(updated to address review feedback via issue tracker)

Ready for review again.

On Mon, Mar 11, 2013 at 4:59 PM, <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:

> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/7606044/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7606044/>
>

LGTM except I think the word is "dechunked" rather than "unchunked".
On 12 Mar 2013 11:02, "Brad Fitzpatrick" <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:

(updated to address review feedback via issue tracker)

Ready for review again.
